Name: Chafer Activity
Description:
Detects Chafer activity attributed to OilRig as reported in Nyotron report in March 2018

Author: Florian Roth, Markus Neis, Jonhnathan Ribeiro, Daniil Yugoslavskiy, oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (command like '%\Service.exe%' and (command like '%i' or command like '%u')) or (command like '%\microsoft\Taskbar\autoit3.exe' and command like 'C:\wsc.exe%') or (process_path like '%\Windows\Temp\DB\%' and process_path like '%.exe') or ((command like '%\nslookup.exe%' and command like '%-q=TXT%') and parent_process_path like '%\Autoit%')
